Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Menu: a class to display on the screen an interactive menu. Reads input from a file and allows the user to add/remove events from the records of registered customers, to display all events and registered customers, and to send messages to users if no more tickets are available. Dimitrios Parzigkas 14-12-2017

    • Method Detail

      • addEvent

        public static void addEvent()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        A method to add an event to a customer's record. It stores the name of the event and the tickets purchased. The maximum number of events is three per customer. If no tickets are available, a text file will be printed informing the customer that there are no tickets left. The method will request the name of the customer, the name of the event and the no of tickets required. User input is validated.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printCustomers

        public static void printCustomers()
        A method to print a record of all the registered customers, along with the events and the tickets they have purchased.

      • printEvents

        public static void printEvents()
        A method that prints out a list of all events sorted alphabetically in ascending order

      • printMenu

        public static void printMenu()
        A method to print the Menu on the screen.

      • readFile

        public static void readFile()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        A method to read input from a file, store the input according to its type to two sorted array lists available to other methods in the class.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • removeEvent

        public static void removeEvent()
        A method to remove an event from a customer's record.

      • searchCustomer

        public static Customer searchCustomer()
        A method to retrieve a customer's name. Validates input.

      • searchEvent

        public static Event searchEvent()
        A method to retrieve an event and the tickets left for that event. Validates input.
